TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed PackUriHelper extends System.Object
public ref class PackUriHelper abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供公用程式方法來撰寫和剖析 Pack URI 物件。

span.span: Provides utility methods to compose and parse pack URI objects.

MemberSignature.Value: public static int ComparePackUri (Uri firstPackUri, Uri secondPackUri);
.method public static hidebysig int32 ComparePackUri(class System.Uri firstPackUri, class System.Uri secondPackUri) cil managed
Public Shared Function ComparePackUri (firstPackUri As Uri, secondPackUri As Uri) As Integer
public: static int ComparePackUri(Uri ^ firstPackUri, Uri ^ secondPackUri);

span.span: The first pack URI.
The second pack URI.

summary.span: 傳回值，這個值表示兩個 Pack URI 是否相等。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether two pack URIs are equivalent.

returns.span: 帶正負號的整數，表示 與 之間的關聯性。

span.span: A signed integer indicating the relationship between and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果兩個`firstPackUri`和`secondPackUri`是`null`，傳回 0。If both `firstPackUri` and `secondPackUri` are `null`, returns 0. 比較封包 Uri，空值 URI 一律是小於非空值 URI。When comparing pack URIs, a null URI is always less than a non-null URI. 案例其中`firstPackUri`和`secondPackUri`是絕對的這兩組件的 Uri，執行比較。For cases where `firstPackUri` and `secondPackUri` are both absolute pack URIs, performs the comparison.

span.span: Either or is not an absolute [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
-or-

exception.span: 或 的開頭不是 "pack://" 配置。

span.span: Either or do not begin with a "pack://" scheme.

MemberSignature.Value: public static int ComparePartUri (Uri firstPartUri, Uri secondPartUri);

Public Shared Function ComparePartUri (firstPartUri As Uri, secondPartUri As Uri) As Integer
public: static int ComparePartUri(Uri ^ firstPartUri, Uri ^ secondPartUri);

span.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the first .
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the second .

summary.span: 傳回值，指出兩個套件組件 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] 是否相等。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether two package part [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] are equivalent.

returns.span: 一個值，表示 與 之間的關聯性。

span.span: A value that indicates the relationship between and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果兩個`firstPartUri`和`secondPartUri`是`null`，傳回 0。If both `firstPartUri` and `secondPartUri` are `null`, returns 0. 比較時 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)]，null[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]一律為非 null 值大於或等於[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]。When comparing [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)], a null [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] is always less than a non-null [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]. 案例其中`firstPartUri`和`secondPartUri`都相對Uri、執行比較。For cases where `firstPartUri` and `secondPartUri` are both relative URIs, performs the comparison.

exception.span: 或 不是有效的組件 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] 語法。

span.span: or is not a valid part [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] syntax.
Creates a new pack URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表說明範例案例方法。The following table illustrates sample cases for the method. |`packageUri`|`partUri`|`fragment`|傳回組件的 URIReturned pack URI| |------------------|---------------|----------------|-----------------------| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/page1.xaml/page1.xaml|#intro#intro|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page1.xaml#intropack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page1.xaml#intro| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/page2.xaml/page2.xaml|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page2.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page2.xaml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/a/page4.xaml/a/page4.xaml|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page4.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page4.xaml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/%41/%61.xml/%41/%61.xml|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/A/a.xmlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/A/a.xml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/%25XY.xml/%25XY.xml|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/%25XY.xmlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/%25XY.xml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/a/page5.xaml/a/page5.xaml|#summary#summary|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page5.xaml#summarypack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page5.xaml#summary| |http://www.proseware.com/packages.aspx?pkg04|/page1.xaml/page1.xaml|#intro#intro|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fpkg04/page1.xaml#intropack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fpkg04/page1.xaml#intro| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|**null****null**|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkgpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg| |ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abcftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc|/a/mydoc.xaml/a/mydoc.xaml|**null****null**|pack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/mydoc.xamlpack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/mydoc.xaml| |file:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkgfile:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkg|/a/bar.xaml/a/bar.xaml|#xref#xref|pack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml#xrefpack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml#xref| 撰寫的組件的 URI 是多重步驟的程序。Composing a pack URI is a multi-step process. 例如，形成 URI 的組件的其中一個步驟是取代的正斜線 （/） 字元`packageUri`使用逗號 （，）。For example, one step in forming a pack URI is to replace the forward slash (/) characters of the `packageUri` with commas (,). 如需有關字串轉換和封包 Uri 的形成方式的詳細資訊，請參閱附錄 A.4 「 字串轉換範例 」 和附錄 B.3"撰寫組件 URI"下載開放式封裝慣例規格中[規格和授權下載](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。For more information on string conversion and how pack URIs are formed, see Appendix A.4 "String Conversion Examples" and Appendix B.3 "Composing a Pack URI" in the Open Packaging Conventions specification available for download at [Specifications and License Downloads](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).

MemberSignature.Value: public static Uri Create (Uri packageUri);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Uri Create(class System.Uri packageUri) cil managed
Public Shared Function Create (packageUri As Uri) As Uri
public: static Uri ^ Create(Uri ^ packageUri);

span.span: The URI of the referenced .

summary.span: 建立指向封裝的新 Pack URI。

span.span: Creates a new pack URI that points to a package.

returns.span: 特定 所參考之 的 Pack URI。

span.span: The pack URI for the referenced by the given .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `packageUri` 未指定為`null`或空白。`packageUri` may not be specified as `null` or empty. 下表說明範例案例。The following table illustrates sample cases for . |`packageUri`|傳回組件的 URIReturned pack URI| |------------------|-----------------------| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkgpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg| |ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abcftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc|pack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abcpack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc| |file:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkgfile:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkg|pack://file:、、 d:,packages,mypackage2.pkgpack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg| 撰寫的組件的 URI 是多重步驟的程序。Composing a pack URI is a multi-step process. 例如，形成 URI 的組件的其中一個步驟是取代的正斜線 （/） 字元`packageUri`使用逗號 （，）。For example, one step in forming a pack URI is to replace the forward slash (/) characters of the `packageUri` with commas (,). 如需有關字串轉換和封包 Uri 的形成方式的詳細資訊，請參閱附錄 A.4 「 字串轉換範例 」 和附錄 B.3"撰寫組件 URI"下載開放式封裝慣例規格中[規格和授權下載](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。For more information on string conversion and how pack URIs are formed, see Appendix A.4 "String Conversion Examples" and Appendix B.3 "Composing a Pack URI" in the Open Packaging Conventions specification available for download at [Specifications and License Downloads](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法定義的組件參考封裝的 URI。The following example shows how to use the method to define a pack URI that references a package. [!code-csharp[RightsManagedPackagePublish#RmPkgPubGetFixDoc](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RightsManagedPackagePublish/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#rmpkgpubgetfixdoc)] [!code-vb[RightsManagedPackagePublish#RmPkgPubGetFixDoc](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RightsManagedPackagePublish/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#rmpkgpubgetfixdoc)]

is not an absolute URI.

span.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the .
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the in the package.

summary.span: 使用 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] 和套件組件的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]，來建立 Pack URI。

span.span: Creates a pack URI given a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] and the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of a part in the package.
The pack URI of the given .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `packageUri` 不可以指定為 null 或空白。`packageUri` may not be specified as null or empty. 如果`partUri`是`null`，傳回的 pack URI 指向封裝。If `partUri` is `null`, the returned pack URI points to the package. 下表說明範例案例方法。The following table illustrates sample cases for the method. |`packageUri`|`partUri`|傳回組件的 URIReturned pack URI| |------------------|---------------|-----------------------| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/page2.xaml/page2.xaml|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page2.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page2.xaml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/a/page4.xaml/a/page4.xaml|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page4.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page4.xaml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/%41/%61.xml/%41/%61.xml|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/A/a.xmlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/A/a.xml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/%25XY.xml/%25XY.xml|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/%25XY.xmlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/%25XY.xml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkgpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg| |ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abcftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc|/a/mydoc.xaml/a/mydoc.xaml|pack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/mydoc.xamlpack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/mydoc.xaml| |file:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkgfile:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkg|/a/bar.xaml/a/bar.xaml|pack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xamlpack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml| 撰寫的組件的 URI 是多重步驟的程序。Composing a pack URI is a multi-step process. 例如，形成 URI 的組件的其中一個步驟是取代的正斜線 （/） 字元`packageUri`使用逗號 （，）。For example, one step in forming a pack URI is to replace the forward slash (/) characters of the `packageUri` with commas (,). 如需有關字串轉換和封包 Uri 的形成方式的詳細資訊，請參閱附錄 A.4 「 字串轉換範例 」 和附錄 B.3"撰寫組件 URI"下載開放式封裝慣例規格中[規格和授權下載](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。For more information on string conversion and how pack URIs are formed, see Appendix A.4 "String Conversion Examples" and Appendix B.3 "Composing a Pack URI" in the Open Packaging Conventions specification available for download at [Specifications and License Downloads](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法定義的組件參考封裝的 URI。The following example shows how to use the method to define a pack URI that references a package. [!code-csharp[RightsManagedPackagePublish#RmPkgPubGetFixDoc](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RightsManagedPackagePublish/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#rmpkgpubgetfixdoc)] [!code-vb[RightsManagedPackagePublish#RmPkgPubGetFixDoc](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RightsManagedPackagePublish/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#rmpkgpubgetfixdoc)]

Public Shared Function Create (packageUri As Uri, partUri As Uri, fragment As String) As Uri
public: static Uri ^ Create(Uri ^ packageUri, Uri ^ partUri, System::String ^ fragment);

span.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the .
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the in the package.

param.name: fragment
param.span: 識別此封裝組件中項目的 "#" 參考。

span.span: A "#" reference identifying an element within the package part.

summary.span: 使用 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]、套件組件的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]，以及要附加的 "#" 片段，來建立 Pack URI。

span.span: Creates a pack URI given a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of a part in the package, and a "#" fragment to append.

returns.span: 識別指定的封裝、封裝組件以及片段的封裝 URI。

span.span: The pack URI that identifies the specified package, package part, and fragment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `packageUri` 未指定為`null`或空白。`packageUri` may not be specified as `null` or empty. 如果`partUri`是`null`，傳回的 pack URI 指向封裝。If `partUri` is `null`, the returned pack URI points to the package. `fragment` 不能是空字串，但是可以指定為`null`。`fragment` cannot be an empty string but can be specified as `null`. 當未指定為`null`、`fragment`字串必須以 '#' 字元開頭。When not specified as `null`, the `fragment` string must begin with a '#' character. 如需詳細資訊的語法`fragment`參考資料，請參閱 3.5 節 「 片段 」 的[RFC 3986](http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3986.txt)。For more information of the syntax of `fragment` references, see Section 3.5 "Fragment" of [RFC 3986](http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3986.txt). 下表說明範例案例方法。The following table illustrates sample cases for the method. |`packageUri`|`partUri`|`fragment`|傳回組件的 URIReturned pack URI| |------------------|---------------|----------------|-----------------------| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/page1.xaml/page1.xaml|#intro#intro|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page1.xaml#intropack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page1.xaml#intro| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/page2.xaml/page2.xaml|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page2.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page2.xaml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/a/page4.xaml/a/page4.xaml|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page4.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page4.xaml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/%41/%61.xml/%41/%61.xml|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/A/a.xmlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/A/a.xml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/%25XY.xml/%25XY.xml|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/%25XY.xmlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/%25XY.xml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/a/page5.xaml/a/page5.xaml|#summary#summary|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page5.xaml#summarypack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page5.xaml#summary| |http://www.proseware.com/packages.aspx?pkg04|/page1.xaml/page1.xaml|#intro#intro|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fpkg04/page1.xaml#intropack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fpkg04/page1.xaml#intro| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|**null****null**|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkgpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg| |ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abcftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc|/a/mydoc.xaml/a/mydoc.xaml|**null****null**|pack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/mydoc.xamlpack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/mydoc.xaml| |file:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkgfile:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkg|/a/bar.xaml/a/bar.xaml|#xref#xref|pack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml#xrefpack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml#xref| 撰寫的組件的 URI 是多重步驟的程序。Composing a pack URI is a multi-step process. 例如，形成 URI 的組件的其中一個步驟是取代的正斜線 （/） 字元`packageUri`使用逗號 （，）。For example, one step in forming a pack URI is to replace the forward slash (/) characters of the `packageUri` with commas (,). 如需有關字串轉換和封包 Uri 的形成方式的詳細資訊，請參閱附錄 A.4 「 字串轉換範例 」 和附錄 B.3"撰寫組件 URI"下載開放式封裝慣例規格中[規格和授權下載](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。For more information on string conversion and how pack URIs are formed, see Appendix A.4 "String Conversion Examples" and Appendix B.3 "Composing a Pack URI" in the Open Packaging Conventions specification available for download at [Specifications and License Downloads](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法定義的組件參考封裝的 URI。The following example shows how to use the method to define a pack URI that references a package. [!code-csharp[RightsManagedPackagePublish#RmPkgPubGetFixDoc](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RightsManagedPackagePublish/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#rmpkgpubgetfixdoc)] [!code-vb[RightsManagedPackagePublish#RmPkgPubGetFixDoc](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RightsManagedPackagePublish/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#rmpkgpubgetfixdoc)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static Uri CreatePartUri (Uri partUri);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Uri CreatePartUri(class System.Uri partUri) cil managed
Public Shared Function CreatePartUri (partUri As Uri) As Uri
public: static Uri ^ CreatePartUri(Uri ^ partUri);

span.span: The URI of the within the package.
Creates a formatted URI.
A formatted URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]的一律從參考根。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of a is always referenced from the root. 傳回URI 是絕對路徑的開頭一律"/"且符合定義的語法[開放式封裝慣例規格](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。The returned URI is an absolute path that always starts with "/" and conforms to the syntax defined in the [Open Packaging Conventions Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255). 下表說明範例案例。The following table illustrates sample cases for . |`partUri`|傳回的部分 URIReturned Part URI| |---------------|-----------------------| |picture1.jpgpicture1.jpg|/picture1.jpg/picture1.jpg| |/picture2.jpg/picture2.jpg|/picture2.jpg/picture2.jpg| |a/mydoc.xamla/mydoc.xaml|/a/mydoc.xaml/a/mydoc.xaml| |/b/bar.xaml/b/bar.xaml|/b/bar.xaml/b/bar.xaml| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法定義的相對 Uri項目。The following example shows how to use the method to define relative URIs for elements. [!code-csharp[PackageWrite#PackageWriteCreatePartUri](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PackageWrite/CSharp/PackageWrite.cs#packagewritecreateparturi)] [!code-vb[PackageWrite#PackageWriteCreatePartUri](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PackageWrite/visualbasic/packagewrite.vb#packagewritecreateparturi)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表說明範例案例。The following table illustrates sample cases for . |`packUri`|傳回的封裝 URIReturned Package URI| |---------------|--------------------------| |pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.xyz/a/mydoc.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.xyz/a/mydoc.xaml|http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.xyz| |pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fmypackage/a/bar.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fmypackage/a/bar.xaml|http://www.proseware.com/packages.aspx?mypackage| |pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkgpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg|http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg| |pack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/picture.jpgpack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/picture.jpg|ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abcftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc| |pack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xamlpack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml|file:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkgfile:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkg|

MemberSignature.Value: public static Uri GetPartUri (Uri packUri);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Uri GetPartUri(class System.Uri packUri) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetPartUri (packUri As Uri) As Uri
public: static Uri ^ GetPartUri(Uri ^ packUri);

param.name: packUri
param.span: 要從其中傳回 URI 的 pack URI。

summary.span: 傳回指定 Pack URI 中的 URI。

span.span: Returns the URI of a within a specified pack URI.

returns.span: 的 URI，位於特定 , 或 (如果 指向套件而不是指向 的話)。

span.span: The URI of the in the given , or if points to a package instead of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回URI 為相對於封裝根目錄，並且開頭一律是絕對路徑"/"且符合定義的語法[開放式封裝慣例規格](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。The returned URI is relative to the package root and is an absolute path that always starts with "/" and conforms to the syntax defined in the [Open Packaging Conventions Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255). 下表說明範例案例。The following table illustrates sample cases for . |`packUri`|傳回的部分 URIReturned Part URI| |---------------|-----------------------| |pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.xyz/a/mydoc.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.xyz/a/mydoc.xaml|/a/mydoc.xaml/a/mydoc.xaml| |pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fmypackage/a/bar.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fmypackage/a/bar.xaml|/a/bar.xaml/a/bar.xaml| |pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkgpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg|nullnull| |pack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/picture.jpgpack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/picture.jpg|/a/picture.jpg/a/picture.jpg| |pack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xamlpack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml|/a/bar.xaml/a/bar.xaml|

remarks.format: ## Remarks `partUri` 必須識別（"/"） 或不組件。`partUri` must identify either the ("/") or a that is not a part. 如需有關組件，請參閱可從開放式封裝慣例規格中的區段 9.3 「 關聯性 」[規格和授權下載](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。For more information about parts, see Section 9.3 "Relationships" in the Open Packaging Conventions Specification available for download at [Specifications and License Downloads](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255). ## Examples [WPF 中的 Pack URIPack URIs in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/pack-uris-in-wpf.md) [開放式封裝慣例規格Open Packaging Conventions Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性關聯性的組件必須識別其中（"/"） 或不。The property of a relationship part must identify either the ("/") or a that is not a . 比方說，如果封裝組件 」 / files/document.xaml"關聯性的組件的來源擁有者 」 / files/_rels/document.xaml.rels"，則呼叫與`relationshipPartUri`參數 」 / files/_rels/document.xaml.rels"傳回的 「 / files/document.xaml"。For example, if the package part "/files/document.xaml" is the source owner of the relationship part "/files/_rels/document.xaml.rels", calling with the `relationshipPartUri` parameter of "/files/_rels/document.xaml.rels" returns the of "/files/document.xaml".

MemberSignature.Value: public static Uri ResolvePartUri (Uri sourcePartUri, Uri targetUri);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Uri ResolvePartUri(class System.Uri sourcePartUri, class System.Uri targetUri) cil managed
Public Shared Function ResolvePartUri (sourcePartUri As Uri, targetUri As Uri) As Uri
public: static Uri ^ ResolvePartUri(Uri ^ sourcePartUri, Uri ^ targetUri);

param.name: sourcePartUri
param.span: 來源組件的 URI，或是 "/" 以指定 根目錄。

span.span: The URI of the source part, or "/" to designate the root.

param.name: targetUri
param.span: 相對於目標組件的 URI。

span.span: The relative URI to the target part.

summary.span: 傳回組件 URI，提供來源組件 URI 以及含有目標組件相對路徑的 URI。

span.span: Returns a part URI given a source part URI and a URI with a relative path to a target part.

returns.span: 在指定的 與 參數之間解析的目標組件之 URI。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表說明範例案例。The following table illustrates sample cases for . |`sourcePartUri`|`targetUri`|傳回的 URIReturned URI| |---------------------|-----------------|------------------| |/mydoc/markup/page.xml/mydoc/markup/page.xml|picture.jpgpicture.jpg|/mydoc/markup/picture.jpg/mydoc/markup/picture.jpg| |/mydoc/markup/page.xml/mydoc/markup/page.xml|images/picture.jpgimages/picture.jpg|/mydoc/markup/images/picture.jpg/mydoc/markup/images/picture.jpg| |/mydoc/markup/page.xml/mydoc/markup/page.xml|./picture.jpg./picture.jpg|/mydoc/markup/picture.jpg/mydoc/markup/picture.jpg| |/mydoc/markup/page.xml/mydoc/markup/page.xml|../picture.jpg../picture.jpg|/mydoc/picture.jpg/mydoc/picture.jpg| |/mydoc/markup/page.xml/mydoc/markup/page.xml|../images/picture.jpg../images/picture.jpg|/mydoc/images/picture.jpg/mydoc/images/picture.jpg| |/|images/picture.jpgimages/picture.jpg|/images/picture.jpg/images/picture.jpg| ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following example shows how to use the method. 如需完整範例，請參閱[讀取封裝範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160034)。For the complete sample, see [Reading a Package Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160034).
